commitMessage:
@@@Improve the data load in Helix Spectator (RoutingTableProvider).  which includes:
1) Put event callback handler in a spearate thread so other ZK event callbacks won't be blocked.
2) Deduplicate the callbacks from same event type.  always keep just one latest copy of event callback in the event queue.
3) Add methods to return all instances and liveInstances in the cluster.
@@@Allow to get all resources from RoutingTableProvider class.
@@@Support RoutingTableChangeListener in RoutingTableProvider. Add test for it.
@@@Fix a couple of tests.  and reduce the total test times.

@@@Refine RoutingTable refresh() logic.

Simplify the construtors.
Refine Log string to a clearer statement.
Fixing a potential bug that empty instanceConfig is recorded in the RoutingTable.
